## Source: ossf-package-analysis (b7952d7703221f736f36b232e942803539ca0ebf66b1c2aaec2ab61ea6322a3c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'groq-mcp' @ 9.9.9 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
